y.description: A numeric or unit object specifying the starting row y-position

height.description: A numeric or unit object specifying the height of rows

space.description: A numeric or unit object specifying the space between rows

n.description: An integer specifying the number of elements to generate rowpositions for

default.units.description: A string indicating the default units to useif \code{y}, \code{h}, or \code{s} are only given as numerics
